section.title: Backward compatibility summary
section.para: The Index Service is completely backward compatible with the version included in the GT previousversion release.

Protocol changes since GT version 4.0
Because of the Java WS Core protocol upgrades, this version is not compatible with Globus Toolkit 4.0 services. See the Java WS Core Release Notes for more details.

API changes since GT version 4.0
None.

Schema changes since GT version 4.0
The Index Service is affected by the schema changes made as part of the Java WS Core protocol upgrades. See the Java WS Core Release Notes for more details.
